tenable.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a belief, argument etc that is tenable is reasonable and can be defended successfully
tenable.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: an idea which is no longer tenable
tenable.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a job or position that is tenable for a particular length of time can be held by a person for that length of time
tenable.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: How long is the post tenable for?
